Headline: Temporary Southbound #34 South Michigan Reroute near 131st Langley
ShortDescription: Southbound 34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted near 131st Langley.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted via 133rd Place, 134th Street, Indiana, and resume normal route, due to street blockage near 131st Langley.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 63rd-bound Green and Midway-bound Orange Line Delays
ShortDescription: 63rd-bound Green & Midway-bound Orange Line trains running w/residual delays following earlier sick customer near Roosevelt. Service resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
63rd-bound Green & Midway-bound Orange Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier sick customer near Roosevelt.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
